New-York Historical Society
"Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" Broadway theatre show programs and ephemera
Lyric Theatre (New York, N.Y.)
AHMC -Harry Potter
6 items in one folder
2018 The Showbill theatre programs of April 2018 for "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child: Part One" and "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child: Part Two"; a set of two tickets for the official Broadway opening on Sunday, April 22, 2018, of the two part Harry Potter play; a pass to the party at Cipriani 42nd Street event space held after the evening performance of Part Two; and the envelope holding the tickets and pass.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" Broadway theatre show programs and ephemera.
